Sentencas: This study highlights the strong effect of chromium (Cr6+) as a nucleating agent for SiO2-MgO-Al2O3-B2O3-K2O-F glass sealant.
Titulo: Cr+6 Controlled Nucleation in SiO2-MgO-Al2O3-K2O-B2O3-F Glass Sealant (SOFC)

Sentencas: In the process, Al2O3 from the base glass was gradually substituted by K2Cr2O7, which considerably tuned the crystallization characteristics, microstructure, thermal, and mechanical properties.
Titulo: Cr+6 Controlled Nucleation in SiO2-MgO-Al2O3-K2O-B2O3-F Glass Sealant (SOFC)

Sentencas: The distinctive feature of this study is the induction of nucleation and crystallization in glass matrix on addition of Cr6+ content performing only annealing heat-treatment (600 degrees C).
Titulo: Cr+6 Controlled Nucleation in SiO2-MgO-Al2O3-K2O-B2O3-F Glass Sealant (SOFC)

Sentencas: The melt-quenched SiO2-MgO-Al2O3-B2O3-K2O-F glass with zero Cr6+ content is found amorphous, which in presence of Cr6+ content became crystalline with MgCr2O4, K3CrF6, MgF2, and mullite (3Al(2)O(3).2SiO(2)) phases.
Titulo: Cr+6 Controlled Nucleation in SiO2-MgO-Al2O3-K2O-B2O3-F Glass Sealant (SOFC)

Sentencas: Glassy features in DSC and dilatometric thermal properties (T-g, T-d, thermal expansion) were attained in glass without Cr- content, but glass-ceramic-like features obtained for Cr- containing glasses.
Titulo: Cr+6 Controlled Nucleation in SiO2-MgO-Al2O3-K2O-B2O3-F Glass Sealant (SOFC)

Sentencas: Large thermal expansion (>11 x 10(-6)/K) was achieved for such glasses, and that is compatible with the CTE of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) components (electrode, interconnect, etc.) at the operating temperature (700-900 degrees C).
Titulo: Cr+6 Controlled Nucleation in SiO2-MgO-Al2O3-K2O-B2O3-F Glass Sealant (SOFC)

Sentencas: FESEM study revealed the development of 200-500 nm sized crystallites in 2 mol% K2Cr2O7-containing glass microstructure and that became more compact sorted with 10-50 mu m sized crystals in higher Cr-doped glasses.
Titulo: Cr+6 Controlled Nucleation in SiO2-MgO-Al2O3-K2O-B2O3-F Glass Sealant (SOFC)

Sentencas: Higher crystallinity was thus ascertained for higher Cr-containing glasses, which influenced the corresponding density and mechanical properties.
Titulo: Cr+6 Controlled Nucleation in SiO2-MgO-Al2O3-K2O-B2O3-F Glass Sealant (SOFC)

Sentencas: From nano-indentation measurements, the hardness and Young's modulus were estimated to be 0.6 (+/- 0.5) and 25 (+/- 10) GPa, respectively, for base glass and in the range of 3.3 to 8.4 and 58 to 94 GPa, respectively, for Cr-containing glass-ceramics.
Titulo: Cr+6 Controlled Nucleation in SiO2-MgO-Al2O3-K2O-B2O3-F Glass Sealant (SOFC)

Sentencas: Hardness measured from micro-indentation tests for the base glass was 3.63 (+/- 0.18) GPa, which increased to 3.94-6.08 GPa for Cr-containing glass-ceramics.
Titulo: Cr+6 Controlled Nucleation in SiO2-MgO-Al2O3-K2O-B2O3-F Glass Sealant (SOFC)

Sentencas: Due to the typical microstructure and compatible thermal and mechanical properties, 2 mol% K2Cr2O7-doped SiO2-MgO-Al2O3-B2O3-K2O-F glass can be useable as high temperature sealant (like SOFC).
Titulo: Cr+6 Controlled Nucleation in SiO2-MgO-Al2O3-K2O-B2O3-F Glass Sealant (SOFC)
